Join us for an epic Minecraft-themed birthday party! We'll have Minecraft games, a pixel art station, and a TNT pi√±ata. Don't forget to wear your favorite Minecraft gear!

Food and refreshments will be provided. Prepare for a day of mining and crafting fun!
attributes.title: Minecraft Birthday Party
attributes.description: A fun Minecraft-themed birthday party for Alex's 10th birthday
